response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just an object; it's a testament to innovation and excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $10,000. For you, we are willing to extend a special offer at a price of $15,000. This is an opportunity to own a piece that stands out in terms of both functionality and prestige. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this exclusive offer.", "product_price": 15000}
